org.trimou.engine.segment

Interface ContainerSegment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<Segment>, Segment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtendSectionSegment, ExtendSegment, InvertedSectionSegment, RootSegment, SectionSegment

    @Internal
public interface ContainerSegment
extends Segment, Iterable<Segment>
    Segment which contains other segments.
    Author:
    Martin Kouba
